Key Match Events: Lane Thomas hit a three-run homer in the sixth inning
Ben Lively departed with a leg injury in the second inning
Cleveland’s bullpen combined for seven innings of four-hit ball
Post-Match Reflections: The White Sox finished with five hits and were shut out for the 17th time
The White Sox have dropped a franchise-record 14 straight home games
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cleveland’s bullpen began the day with a 36-11 record and a major league-best 2.80 ERA
Pedro Avila got six outs for the win
Eli Morgan, Cade Smith, Tim Herrin, Hunter Gaddis, and Erik Sabrowski combined to close out the game
